message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this product for $170. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I'm only able to pay up to $120 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're interested but $120 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I'm still not able to go above $130 for the product. I hope we can find a middle ground.
